282.desc: The wearer's primary attributes are increased by 1 for every five hero levels.

739.basicDesc:
{Basic Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain:

Grass and Subterranean: by {5} move points
Dirt and Lava: by {10} move points
Rough: by {15} move points
Desert and Snow: by {20} move points
Swamp: by {25} move points
739.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain:

Grass and Subterranean: by {10} move points
Dirt and Lava: by {20} move points
Rough: by {30} move points
Desert and Snow: by {40} move points
Swamp: by {50} move points
739.expertDesc:
{Expert Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain:

Grass and Subterranean: by {15} move points
Dirt and Lava: by {30} move points
Rough: by {45} move points
Desert and Snow: by {60} move points
Swamp: by {75} move points

747.desc1: {10%} of unused movement points convert to experience points.
747.desc2: {20%} of unused movement points convert to experience points.
747.desc3: {30%} of unused movement points convert to experience points.

751.basicDesc:
{Basic Necromancy}

Allows the hero to raise up to {15%} of his/her own defeated creatures as undead after battle.
751.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Necromancy}

Allows the hero to raise up to {30%} of his/her own defeated creatures as undead after battle.
751.expertDesc:
{Expert Necromancy}

Allows the hero to raise up to {50%} of his/her own defeated creatures as undead after battle.

752.desc: Evades indirect attacks and damaging spells.

756.name: {Siegecraft}
756.basicDesc:
{Basic Siegecraft}

Control of catapult
1 aimed shot
Increased damage
Increases moat and tower damage by {+10%} when under siege.
756.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Siegecraft}

Control of catapult
2 aimed shot
Increased damage
Increases moat and tower damage by {+20%} when under siege.
756.expertDesc:
{Expert Siegecraft}

Control of catapult
2 aimed shot
Maximum damage
Increases moat and tower damage by {+30%} when under siege.

758.desc: No morale from heroes. Gets bloodthirsty from killing an enemy.

762.battleLog: @flesheater@ eat the remains of their enemies and restore themselves!

766.desc: Stacks of living creatures in the hero's army are replenished weekly by {@percent@%}.

769.singEncounter:
Coming closer, you notice the @monName@ is greedily guarding:

{@artName@}
769.plurEncounter:
Coming closer, you notice @monName@ are greedily guarding:

{@artName@}
769.leave: Now, with the threat eliminated, @heroName@ obtains:

773.spec:
{Navigation}

Increases the Navigation skill by 5% per level. Reduces the cost of movement points when boarding/landing the boat by another {100} MP.
773.logSpec:
{Logistics}

Receives 5% per level bonus to Logistics skill percentage.

774.basicDesc: When the hero levels up, he/she collects an amount of experience that can be transmitted when meeting another hero.
774.advancedDesc: When the hero levels up, he/she collects an amount of experience that can be transmitted when meeting another hero. Accumulates twice as much experience and the training time is reduced by half.
774.expertDesc: When the hero levels up, he/she collects an amount of experience that can be transmitted when meeting another hero. Accumulates three times more experience and the training time is reduced threefold.

776.name: {El. Suppression}
776.desc1: Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {1} level.
776.desc2: Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {2} levels.
776.desc3: Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {3} levels.
776.neutralized: This is neutralized by any "suppressing artifacts" and {Elemental Suppression} skill of the enemy.
776.sepc:
{Elemental Suppression}

Acts like an additional level of the {Elemental Suppression} skill.

777.desc1: Reduces magic damage received for heroes armies by {5}%.
777.desc2: Reduces magic damage received for heroes armies by {10}%.
777.desc3: Reduces magic damage received for heroes armies by {15}%.

782.name: {Medicine}
782.battleLog: First Aid Tent healing is increased by @hp@ points.

786.desc1:
Reduces hiring or upgrade cost for creatures in external dwellings up to {10%} (reduces gold, not resources).
Reduces the surrender price by {20%}.
786.desc2:
Reduces hiring or upgrade cost for creatures in external dwellings up to {20%} (reduces gold, not resources).
Reduces the surrender price by {40%}.
786.desc3:
Reduces hiring or upgrade cost for creatures in external dwellings up to {30%} (reduces gold, not resources).
Reduces the surrender price by {60%}.
786.scholar1: Reduces the cost of training from a scholar by {10%}.
786.scholar2: Reduces the cost of training from a scholar by {20%}.
786.scholar3: Reduces the cost of training from a scholar by {30%}.

787.desc1:
Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {3% (minimum of 1)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {20% (minimum of 20)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.desc2:
Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {6% (minimum of 2)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {40% (minimum of 40)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.desc3:
Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {9% (minimum of 3)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {60% (minimum of 60)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.spec:
{Mysticism}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {3% (minimum of 1)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {20% (minimum of 20)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.

789.desc1: Gives 10% chance to deal x1.5 spell damage to each target.
789.desc2: Gives 20% chance to deal x1.5 spell damage to each target.
789.desc3: Gives 30% chance to deal x1.5 spell damage to each target.
789.combiArt: Gives 50% chance to deal x1.5 spell damage to each target.
789.spec:
{Sorcery}

Receives a 5% per level bonus to Sorcery skill percentage. Adds 10% chance to deal x1.5 spell damage to each target.

793.name: {Economy}
793.basicDesc:
{Basic Economy}

Increases the daily income of towns by 5%.
793.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Economy}

Increases the daily income of towns by 10%.
793.expertDesc:
{Expert Economy}

Increases the daily income of towns by 15%.
793.spec:
{Economy}

Increase the daily income of towns by 5%
